sqlMap.insert:
SELECT nextval('solarnet.solarnet_seq') AS id
INSERT INTO solarnet.sn_power_datum (id created posted , node_id,
source_id,
price_loc_id, watts, bat_volts, bat_amp_hrs, watt_hour) VALUES (#id# #created# #posted# , #nodeId#,
#sourceId#,
#locationId#, #watts#, #batteryVolts#, #batteryAmpHours#, #wattHourReading#)
sqlMap.update:
UPDATE solarnet.sn_power_datum SET node_id = #nodeId#,
source_id = #sourceId#,
price_loc_id = #locationId#, watts = #watts#, bat_volts = #batteryVolts#, bat_amp_hrs = #batteryAmpHours#, watt_hour = #wattHourReading# WHERE id = #id#
sqlMap.sql: pdatum.id AS sn_power_datum_id, pdatum.created AS sn_power_datum_created, pdatum.posted AS sn_power_datum_posted, pdatum.node_id AS sn_power_datum_node_id, pdatum.source_id AS sn_power_datum_source_id, pdatum.price_loc_id AS sn_power_datum_price_loc_id, pdatum.watts AS sn_power_datum_watts, pdatum.bat_volts AS sn_power_datum_bat_volts, pdatum.bat_amp_hrs AS sn_power_datum_bat_amp_hrs, pdatum.watt_hour AS sn_power_datum_watt_hour
sqlMap.select:
SELECT
FROM solarnet.sn_power_datum pdatum WHERE pdatum.id = #id#

SELECT
FROM solarnet.sn_power_datum pdatum WHERE pdatum.node_id = #id# AND pdatum.created = #date#

SELECT
FROM solarnet.sn_power_datum_most_recent recent INNER JOIN solarnet.sn_power_datum pdatum ON pdatum.id = recent.datum_id WHERE recent.node_id = #node#
AND recent.source_id = #source#
ORDER BY pdatum.source_id

SELECT dates.d AS created_date, COALESCE(data.source, '') AS source, COALESCE(data.watts, -1) AS watts, COALESCE(data.bat_volts, -1) AS bat_volts FROM ( SELECT #start#::timestamp + (series.d * interval '1 minute') AS d FROM generate_series(0, floor(extract('epoch' from #end#::timestamp - #start#::timestamp))::integer / 60 - #precision#, #precision#) AS series(d) ) AS dates
LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT to_timestamp( extract('epoch' from date_trunc('minute', p.created at time zone l.time_zone)) - ((cast(extract('minute' from p.created) as integer) % #precision#) * 60) ) as created_date, p.source_id as source, avg(p.watts) as watts, avg(p.bat_volts) as bat_volts
FROM solarnet.sn_power_datum p INNER JOIN solarnet.sn_node n ON n.node_id = #node# INNER JOIN solarnet.sn_loc l ON l.id = n.loc_id
WHERE p.node_id = #node#
AND p.source_id = #source#
AND p.source_id IN #sources[]#
AND p.created BETWEEN (#start#::timestamp at time zone l.time_zone) AND (#end#::timestamp at time zone l.time_zone)
GROUP BY created_date, p.source_id ) AS data ON data.created_date = dates.d
ORDER BY created_date
sqlMap.sql: dates.d AS created_date, COALESCE(data.source, '') AS source, COALESCE(data.watts, -1) AS watts, COALESCE(data.bat_volts, -1) AS bat_volts, COALESCE(data.wh, -1) AS wh, COALESCE(data.cost_amt, -1) AS cost_amt, COALESCE(data.cost_curr, '') AS cost_curr
sqlMap.select:
SELECT
FROM generate_series(#start#::timestamp, #end#::timestamp, '1 hour') AS dates(d)
LEFT OUTER JOIN (
SELECT c.created_hour as created_date, c.source_id as source, c.watts as watts, c.bat_volts as bat_volts, c.watt_hours as wh, c.cost_amt as cost_amt, c.cost_currency as cost_curr
FROM solarrep.rep_power_datum_hourly c
WHERE c.node_id = #node#
AND c.source_id = #source#
AND c.source_id IN #sources[]#
AND c.created_hour BETWEEN #start# AND #end#
SELECT c.created_hour as created_date, CAST(NULL as integer) as watts, CAST(NULL as real) as bat_volts, sum(c.watt_hours) as wh, CAST(NULL as real) as cost_amt, CAST(NULL as varchar) as cost_curr
FROM solarrep.rep_net_power_datum_hourly c
WHERE c.created_hour BETWEEN #start# AND #end#
GROUP BY created_date
) AS data ON data.created_date = dates.d
ORDER BY created_date

SELECT
FROM ( SELECT date(#start#) + series.d AS d FROM generate_series(0, date(#end#) - date(#start#)) AS series(d) ) AS dates
LEFT OUTER JOIN (
SELECT c.created_day as created_date, c.source_id as source, c.watts, c.bat_volts, c.watt_hours as wh, c.cost_amt, c.cost_currency as cost_curr
FROM solarrep.rep_power_datum_daily c
WHERE c.created_day BETWEEN #start#::date AND #end#::date AND c.node_id = #node#
AND c.source_id = #source#
AND c.source_id IN #sources[]#
SELECT c.created_day as created_date, CAST(NULL as integer) as watts, CAST(NULL as real) as bat_volts, c.watt_hours as wh, CAST(NULL as real) as cost_amt, CAST(NULL as text) as cost_curr
FROM solarrep.rep_net_power_datum_daily c
WHERE c.created_day BETWEEN #start#::date AND #end#::date
) AS data ON data.created_date = dates.d
ORDER BY created_date

SELECT
FROM ( SELECT date_trunc('week', #start#::timestamp) + (series.d * interval '1 week') AS d FROM generate_series(0, CAST(extract('days' from date_trunc('week', #end#::timestamp) - date_trunc('week', #start#::timestamp)) / 7 AS INTEGER) ) AS series(d) ) AS dates
LEFT OUTER JOIN (
SELECT date_trunc('week', c.created_day) as created_date, c.source_id as source, avg(c.watts) as watts, avg(c.bat_volts) as bat_volts, sum(c.watt_hours) as wh, sum(c.cost_amt) as cost_amt, min(c.cost_currency) as cost_curr
FROM solarrep.rep_power_datum_daily c
WHERE c.node_id = #node#
AND c.source_id = #source#
AND c.source_id IN #sources[]#
AND c.created_day >= date_trunc('week', #start#::timestamp)::date AND c.created_day < (date_trunc('week', #end#::timestamp) + interval '1 week')::date
GROUP BY created_date, c.source_id
SELECT date_trunc('week', c.created_day) as created_date, CAST(NULL as real) as watts, CAST(NULL as real) as bat_volts, sum(c.watt_hours) as wh, CAST(NULL as real) as cost_amt, CAST(NULL as varchar) as cost_curr
FROM solarrep.rep_net_power_datum_daily c
WHERE c.created_day >= date_trunc('week', #start#::timestamp)::date AND c.created_day < (date_trunc('week', #end#::timestamp) + interval '1 week')::date
GROUP BY created_date
) AS data ON data.created_date = dates.d
ORDER BY created_date

SELECT
FROM ( SELECT date_trunc('month', date(#start#)) + (series.d * interval '1 month') AS d FROM generate_series(0, (((extract('year' from #end#::timestamp) - extract('year' from #start#::timestamp)) * 12) + (extract('month' from #end#::timestamp) - extract('month' from #start#::timestamp)))::integer ) AS series(d) ) AS dates
LEFT OUTER JOIN (
SELECT date_trunc('month', c.created_day) as created_date, c.source_id as source, avg(c.watts) as watts, avg(c.bat_volts) as bat_volts, sum(c.watt_hours) as wh, sum(c.cost_amt) as cost_amt, min(c.cost_currency) as cost_curr
FROM solarrep.rep_power_datum_daily c
WHERE c.node_id = #node#
AND c.source_id = #source#
AND c.source_id IN #sources[]#
AND c.created_day >= #start#::date AND c.created_day < (#end#::date + interval '1 month')::date
GROUP BY created_date, c.source_id
SELECT date_trunc('month', c.created_day) as created_date, CAST(NULL as real) as watts, CAST(NULL as real) as bat_volts, sum(c.watt_hours) as wh, CAST(NULL as real) as cost_amt, CAST(NULL as varchar) as cost_curr
FROM solarrep.rep_net_power_datum_daily c
WHERE c.created_day >= #start#::date AND c.created_day < (#end#::date + interval '1 month')::date
GROUP BY created_date
) AS data ON data.created_date = dates.d
ORDER BY created_date

SELECT DISTINCT source_id FROM solarrep.rep_power_datum_daily WHERE node_id = #node#
AND created_day >= #start#::date
AND created_day <= #end#::date
